{"id":551443005,"lang":"cpp","time":"7Â months","timestamp":1631098970,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"22 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/551443005/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Edit Distance","memory":"6.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minDistance(string word1, string word2) {\n        int n = word1.size(), m = word2.size();\n        vector<vector<int>> dp(2, vector<int> (m + 1, 0));\n        \n        for(int j = 0; j <= m; j++)\n            dp[0][j] = j;\n        \n        int i;\n        for(i = 1; i <= n; i++)\n        {\n            dp[i & 1][0] = i;\n            for(int j = 1; j <= m; j++)\n            {\n                if(word1[i - 1] == word2[j - 1])\n                    dp[i & 1][j] = dp[1 - (i & 1)][j - 1];\n                else\n                {\n                    int a = dp[1 - (i & 1)][j];\n                    int b = dp[i & 1][j - 1];\n                    int c = dp[1 - (i & 1)][j - 1];\n                    dp[i & 1][j] = min({a, b, c}) + 1;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return dp[(i - 1) & 1][m];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"edit-distance"}
